name: Modafinil
desc: You have taken some modafinil recently.

name: Common Cold Antibodies
desc: Common cold antibodies in your bloodstream prevent you from catching common cold.

name: Recent Kill
desc: You have recently killed some creature, and don't feel anxious for now.
remove_message: You feel anxiety coming on.  You need to kill more.

name: Recent Fire
desc: You have recently lit a fire, or have been near one, and don't feel anxious for now.
remove_message: You feel anxiety coming on.  You need more fire.
